In England, in the seven days to 28 March, there were 30,138 new confirmed cases (53.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 March, there were 32,518 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 7% (2,380 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 April is 3,807,387 (6,764.2 cases per 100,000 population).
